---
title: Searchable Metadata and Mode Analyses
---


```{r, echo=F, warnings=F, messages=F}
library(tidyverse)
library(DT)
df <- read.csv("data/beregovski-metadata.tsv", sep="\t", header=TRUE)
df <- df |>  select(!c(Additional.notes, Modulation.Criteria))
df |>          
    datatable(filter="top", rownames=FALSE, width = 1000)
```
